verses.name: Ezekiel 10:3
verses.text: Now the cherubims stood on the right side of the house, when the man went in; and the cloud filled the inner court.

verses.name: Ezekiel 10:4
verses.text: Then the glory of the Lord went up from the cherub, and stood over the threshold of the house; and the house was filled with the cloud, and the court was full of the brightness of the Lord’s glory.

verses.name: Ezekiel 10:5
verses.text: And the sound of the cherubims’ wings was heard even to the outer court, as the voice of the Almighty God when he speaketh.
